message:
Eave is a general term used to describe the lowest courses of slates or tiles
and the timber supporting them.

Purlins are horizontal timbers supported by end walls or struts to internal loadbearing
walls.

A fascia or gutter board 25mm thick is nailed to rafters and ceiling joist ends

fascia is vertical while soffit is vertical
title: 2023/5/3 做作业时急用知识
